Title: Food Tour of Italy
Start: After deciding to go on a last-minute solo vacation, you've arrived your perfect food focused vacation destination: Italy! While your here, see if you can complete your food-focused bucket list!
Credits: Created by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu). Edited by Celeste Herrera (cherre27@ucsc.edu)

GameWorldItem.TextPre: Talk to concierge and pick up Guide book
GameWorldItem.Use:
Heres a Guide of places to get food in town.
---------------
- Looks like there are some stores you can buy some groceries and snacks next to the hotel, and theres a Cafe next to the Corner Store
- Theres two other Cafes next to the Flower Gardens and Museum, which you can get to from the Town Square.
- And theres a couple Restaurants by the Gardens, as well as next to the Town Square and the Museum.
---------------

You noticed a friendly looking man feeding some birds and decide to have a chat. Turns out he's family friends with the owners of the Nicest Restaurant in town, and lucky for you, he can get you a Reservation!

Airport.Body: Your currently at the Airport. If your hungry you can stop by to get something to eat, if not, you can head over to the Hotel to get checked.

Choices.Text: Take a Taxi to your Hotel
Take a Taxi to a nearby Cafe

Cafe 1.Body:
Welcome to Caffè Al Bicerin. Here you decided to try a popular drink here,
- the Bicerin: a mix of coffee, chocolate, and creme

Choices.Text: Take a Taxi to the Airport

Corner Store.Body: You are currently at the Corner Store near your Hotel. While here, you've picked up some interesting drinks and snacks to try for later.

Hotel.Body: You've arrived to your Hotel. Before heading out to your next destination, you can talk to the concierge for insight on places to go get food.
Hotel.Body2: You are currently at your Hotel.

Choices.Text: Take a taxi to the Airport

Grocery Store.Body: You are currently at the Grocery Store. While here, you've picked up a few groceries.

Town Square.Body: You've made it to the Town Square, from here you can access the rest of the town.

Restaurant 1.Body:
Welcome to Lo Scoglio! While here you decide to order an item on your Bucket List,
- Aranica: a stuffed rice ball, which is coated in breadcrumbs and fried

Choices.Text: Walk back to the Town Square

Garden.Body: You are currently at the Flower Gardens, its a beautiful day to stop and smell the roses.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the Town Square
Head over to a popular Restaurant nearby

Cafe 3.Body:
Welcome to Caffè Gilli! While here you decide to order an item on your Bucket List,
- Maritozzo con la Panna: a sweet roll which is cut open and filled with panna, fresh whipped creme

Choices.Text: Walk back to the Flower Gardens

Restaurant 3.Body:
Welcome to Venissa! While here you decide to order an item on your Bucket List,
- Caccio e Pepe: a pasta with a pecorino ramano and black pepper cheese sauce

Choices.Text: Walk back to the Flower Gardens

Fancy Restaurant.Body: You'll need a reservation to get in, but there aren't any aviable for the next few months.
Fancy Restaurant.Body2:
As promised, the nice man from the Town Square was able to get you a reservation! You decide to order on of their popular menu items,
- Florentine steak: dry-aged for 21 days and cooked on a charcoal grill, served rare

Choices.Text: Walk back to the Flower Gardens

Museum.Body: You are currently at the Museum. All the walking around and looking at historical artifacts has made you hungry, but luckily there are places to eat nearby

Choices.Text: Walk back to the Town Square

Cafe 2.Body:
Welcome to Murena Suite! While here you decide to order an item on your Bucket List,
- Italian Hot Chocolate: a thick and creamy hot chocolate drink

Restaurant 2.Body:
Welcome to Trattoria Pennestri! While here you decide to order an item on your Bucket List,
- Spaghetti alla Puttanesca: a pasta dish made with tomatoes, olive oil, olives, anchovies, chili peppers, capers, and garlic
